name: GENERATIVE  KARAJEH PERSIAN CARPET (RARE EDITION)
description:
Generative artwork exploring color and the emergent effect of stacking simple shapes and filling their intersections.which take you on the journey to an imaginary universe. All artworks are created using custom algorithms in processing.
This collection has an abstract look at Iranian carpets, Iranian art-industrial carpets that have long overshadowed Iranian culture as a name and credit for Iran.

Established with luxurious jewel tones, this antique shabby chic rug Karajeh Carpet from Persia is a striking piece. It is engagingly accented with a brilliant white and tangerine tone, which plays off of the cool-toned turquoise and navy elements to create an alluring design. This 1900’s beauty features a generous number of striped borders that seamlessly draw the eye to the center of the work. Its overall theme can be described as tribal, with the focal point featuring a diamond surrounded by florets of varying sizes and shapes, set in a field of deep navy. Among the artfully placed flowers of this antique carpet are two dominating geometric shapes, which are flanked on either side by a pair of diamonds and charmingly intricate squares.
